amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of any funds appropriated in the bill by the Bureau of Labor Statistics to implement a change in the consumer price index, unless the Congress has authorized such a change.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to prohibit the use of any funds appropriated in the bill for use by the Bureau of Labor Statistics to implement a change in the consumer price index, unless the House of Representatives and the Senate have authorized such a change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kleczka amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
